attachments.title: [ANN] Actors 0.2, GenServers and Guards
attachments.text: I’m happy to announce the release of Actors 0.2 together with two actor infrastructure libraries GenServers and Guards. Actors: Concurrency based on the Actor Model Actors implements the classical Actor model in Julia. It builds on Julia’s concurrency primitives, provides a message based programming model for making concurrency easy to understand and reason about and integrates well with Julia’s features for multi-threading and distributed computing. Actors expresses actor behavior as a fun...

text: So, I'm curious what sort of applications would find an Actors system helpful?  A "MUD" implementation, probably.  What are other examples of applications?  Thanks in advance.
